At the top, there is a search icon and a menu icon, indicating the user can search for other apps or access more options. The Lyft app has two buttons below its logo and name: one to uninstall the app and another to open it, suggesting that the app is already installed on this device. Below that are "Ads" and "Suggested for you" sections with app recommendations such as TAPSI, AccuWeather, and Airbnb. The bottom of the screen features a navigation bar for the app store, likely with options for browsing different categories or settings.
